name: Techyoob Web
description: Techyoob Web is single webpage portoflio application ( beta version ) for my engineering journey. It was built using React, CSS and SVG

name: Pomodoro
description: Pomodoro is a time managment application developed to help break work into intervals of 30 min separated with short and long breaks

name: Stock Screener
description: Trading Screener is full stack solution that sift through thousands of stocks in the U.S to identify patterns and behaviors in a fashion that helps individual investors to rationalize their emotional decisions.
